articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Various Units in Manpho City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Various Units in Manpho City
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il  provided field guidance to various units in Manpho City.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Manpho Smeltery.
					
					 Conducted by a leading official of the smeltery, he went round a room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					  Seeing historic relics and materials on display, he recollected with deep emotion the glorious course of development covered by the smeltery. He said it has turned into a modern non-ferrous metal producer under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung, adding that his undying leadership feats will shine long with the glorious history of the smeltery. 
					
					 Going round various production processes including the general production control room, he acquainted himself in detail with technological updating and production at the smeltery.
					
					 After watching smelters' tapping operation, he was greatly satisfied to see a high level of cultured practices in production and life. 
					
					 After watching the successfully updated production processes, he highly appreciated the feats performed by the workers of the smeltery and members of the scientists and technicians' shock brigade of Kim Chaek University of Technology. He was greatly pleased to learn that they have completed technological updating of the smelting processes in a short span of time true to the WPK's policy of attaching importance to science and thus drastically increased the non-ferrous metal production and radically changed the appearance of the smeltery as required by the new century.
					
					Making the rounds of the newly built dining hall in the compound, vegetable greenhouse and other supply service facilities, he learned about the supply service.
					
					 He repeatedly made a high appreciation of the achievements of the officials, workers and technicians of the smeltery, saying that they have done a lot of work in all aspects including supply service and the creation of a hygienic and cultured environment, to say nothing of production, in a few years.
					
					 He put forward the tasks to be carried out by the smeltery.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Amnokgang Tire Factory.
					
					 After looking round a room for the education in the revolutionary history, he dropped in at various places of the factory seething with a great revolutionary surge and acquainted himself with its production and encouraged the workers in their dynamic drive to increase production.
					
					 Watching for a long while a variety of quality tires being churned out from each worksite fully furnished with modern equipment, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the factory replete with patriotic zeal have successfully wound up the project for capacity expansion and kept production going at a high rate by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 He met again Kim Song Dok and Han Kum Ok, a couple of workers of the finishing shop both of whom he had met at their worksite eleven years back, and highly praised them for such patriotic devotion as having worked with all their wisdom and enthusiasm for the prosperity of the country for decades, remaining intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution.
					
					 He advanced the tasks to be carried out by the factory. 
					
					 The third leg of his guidance was the Manpho Spinning Mill. 
					
					 He acquainted himself with the production and the supply service at the mill, walking round its production processes, raw material store, workers' hostel and various other places. 
					
					 The mill is not a big local industrial establishment with small manpower but has operated on the principle of profitability by positively introducing new technology, not only bringing not a few benefits to the state but contributing to the people's livelihood, he noted, adding that the experience of the local industrial factories throughout the country including the mill which has profusely paid off clearly proved the validity and great vitality of the  policy of simultaneously developing the central and local industries set forth by the President long ago.
					
					 After being told about the laudable deed of Ju Pok Sun, manageress of the mill, he had a cordial talk with her.
					
					  He highly appreciated the feat performed by the manageress, noting that busy as she was as a manageress of the mill, she has taken care of many children as their real parents would do at a difficult time when she was hard pressed for everything and she is, indeed, a woman of fine personality as she is possessed of such communist moral outlook and revolutionary obligation as thinking more of the society and the collective and the Party and the revolution than of herself and devoting her all to them.
					
					  Noting that the Songun era is the great era in which a huge army of the noblest, nicest and purest people in the world is trained, he stressed that invincible is the might of all the servicepersons and people who have embodied the principle of collectivism "One for all and all for one!".
					
					 He called on the workers of the mill to creditably fulfill their duty and thus contribute to the building of a rich and powerful nation and indicated the tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 Then he provided field guidance to the Manpho Restaurant.
					
					 Going round the exterior and interior of the restaurant built in a magnificent and splendid style and seeing a variety of dishes, he acquainted himself in detail with its operation.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to learn that the officials of the city and the employees of the restaurant have not only furnished it with excellent equipment but served citizens with peculiar tasty dishes prepared with locally available foodstuff in the spirit of serving the people.
					
					 Nothing is more honorable and worthwhile than to serve the people, he said, advancing the tasks to be carried out by the restaurant to manage and operate it.
					
					 He toured Manpho City to learn about the city management.
					
					 He was greatly pleased to learn that the officials, Party members and other working people in the city have successfully not only built factories but turned the city into a socialist land of bliss.
					
					 A stirring reality of a great prosperous and powerful nation has begun to unfold in Jagang Province as fresh leaping advances and innovations are being reported day by day and the socialist spirit is running high wherever one goes in the province, he said, stressing that this shining reality serves as a beacon inspiring the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the eminence of a thriving nation.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the people in the province, creators of the Kanggye spirit, would work uninterrupted signal miracles in production and construction and thus play the role of vanguard and shock brigade in the final charge to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: U.S. Troops Warned to Stop Arrogant Acts
articles.content:
U.S. Troops Warned to Stop Arrogant Acts
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The chief of the military working group of the DPRK side in the area under the control of the north and the south in the Eastern and Western regions sent a notice to the puppet military of the south side Saturday in connection with the recent evermore undisguised provocations and violations by the U.S. troops in the area along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL).
					 It said:
					
					 A touch-and-go situation persists on the Korean Peninsula due to the frantic moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the U.S. is working overtly and covertly to strain the situation, pursuant to a sinister scenario to realize its ambition to stifle the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 A typical example is that the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea are stalking in groups in the above-said area any time they please. 
					
					 On Jan. 5 and 21 they approached as close as 30 meters from the MDL in the area under the control of the north and the south in the Western region and took photographs of a post of the DPRK side and monitored vehicles passing through the MDL. 62 personnel and 58 vehicles entered the area 100 meters from the MDL in the said area on as many as 66 occasions up to February 20 this year.
					
					 Such acts perpetrated by the U.S. forces in area along the MDL at the tacit connivance of the south side at a time when the north-south relations are inching close to the brink of a war may touch off unpredictable military conflicts.
					
					 The south side should never forget that the Korean People's Army is keeping itself fully ready for all-out confrontation. 
					
					 If the U.S. forces keep behaving arrogantly in the area under the control of the north and the south, the KPA will take a resolute counteraction.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors had better behave with discretion.

articles.title: Senior CPC Official on Importance of Sino-DPRK Relations
articles.content:
Senior CPC Official on Importance of Sino-DPRK Relations
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Jia Qinglin met the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Department Director of the Central Committee of the WPK Ri Kwang Ho at the Great Hall of the People on Feb. 25.
					 Jia Qinglin said that the China visit by the WPK delegation would brilliantly decorate the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship" and greatly contribute to the development of the relations between the two countries.
					
					 Noting that the Chinese party and government are attaching great importance to the development of the Sino-DPRK relations, he recalled that General-Secretary Hu Jintao stressed more than once that it is the unshakable strategic policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily develop the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship.
					
					 Expressing his belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger through the events of the "year of the Sino-DPRK friendship," he hoped that new areas would be explored and fresh modes be sought for the development of the bilateral relations and they would be enriched with new substance. 
					
					 He proposed deepening the bilateral understanding through the frequent exchange of high-level visits and strengthening the cooperation in economy and trade, exchange in various fields including that between the parties, governments and armies and social organizations of the two countries, cooperation in fields including culture, art, science and technology and education and mutual cooperation in international issues.
					
					 Mutual visits by the leaders of the two countries are playing the most important role in the development of the bilateral ties which nothing can substitute, he said, adding that he warmly welcomes the China visit by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and senior officials of the party and government of the DPRK at a convenient time. 
					
					 He expressed hope that the exchange between youth and children of the two countries, in particular, would be strengthened to develop the Sino-DPRK friendship generation after generation.
					
					 He hoped that both sides would make concerted efforts to inject youthful energy and vitality into the Sino-DPRK friendship, regarding this year, the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries, as a fresh occasion and a new starting-point for boosting the Sino-DPRK relations.

articles.title: 10th Meeting of Joint Presidium of Pomminryon Held
articles.content:
10th Meeting of Joint Presidium of Pomminryon Held
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The 10th meeting of the Joint Presidium of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) was held through exchange of facsimile messages between the north, the south and overseas sides on Saturday.
					 The meeting reviewed last year's work of Pomminryon for national reunification and discussed its action orientation and tasks for this year, etc.
					
					 A report was made there.
					
					 It noted that last year Pomminryon dynamically waged the movement for defending and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration under the banner of "By our nation itself" and the struggle against the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad to incite confrontation among the nation.
					
					 It stated that the organization set a "period of the movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" from June 15 to October 4 this year, encouraging all Koreans to the movement for reunification.
					
					 Pomminryon will intensify the struggle to foil the reckless war scheme of the anti-reunification forces, strongly condemn the adventurous joint military exercises they stage with the foreign forces and more vigorously conduct the actions to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea, it declared.
					
					 The report stressed the need for Pomminryon to take the lead in the struggle to resolutely smash the south Korean conservative authorities' crackdown upon the pro-reunification patriotic forces, get the "National Security Law" and other fascist laws against the nation and reunification abrogated and realize the legalization of such organizations as the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils.
					
					 Pomminryon will as ever positively join efforts with the organizations and personages respecting the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and hoping for their implementation, irrespective of differences in ism and affiliation, and work together for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, it said.
					
					 It stated that Pomminryon would arouse the broad masses at home and abroad to the movement for national reunification through stronger solidarity among the three parties, the north, the south and overseas sides, and powerfully accelerate the nationwide movement for steadily advancing the June 15 era.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Corporation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Corporation
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Vietnam Viettel General Corporation.
					 The gift was handed by Nguyen Manh Hung, vice-president of the corporation, to an official concerned.

articles.title: Austrian Delegation Interviewed
articles.content:
Austrian Delegation Interviewed
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The members of the delegation of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation on a visit to the DPRK were interviewed by KCNA on Feb. 27.
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, head of the delegation, said:
					
					 I was deeply impressed to visit the International Friendship Exhibition House while staying here. Not only party and state leaders and prominent figures of many countries but politicians of countries hostile to the DPRK presented gifts to the respected President Kim Il Sung and HE the great Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The gifts on display help the visitors know well what high prestige the peerlessly great men enjoy.
					
					 He noted that during their stay in the DPRK they witnessed the Korean people striving hard to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful country in 2012 true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We felt a lot visiting the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, he said, and continued:
					
					 We were moved to see workers at work at the modern factory, provided with excellent living conditions. 
					
					 Oskar Smetana, member of the delegation, had this to say: Many countries are in the grip of serious joblessness due to the financial crisis, but the workers in the DPRK are leading a stable life. 
					
					 Goran Lavric, member of the delegation, said the visit helped him clearly realize that the reality of the DPRK is quite different from what was reported by Western media.
					
					The Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road of their own choice, rallied close around Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was conveyed to woman centenarian Kim Yang Sik, a resident in the Phyongwon County Township, South Phyongan Province.
					 She could lead a life worthy of a human being only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 She devotedly worked to increase the agricultural production. She has kept herself busy even since she became a pensioner.
					
					 She is always healthy and optimistic, while having balanced diet.

articles.title: Public Presentations on Bean Production Held
articles.content:
Public Presentations on Bean Production Held
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A scientific and technological presentation and exhibition in the field of bean production and public presentation on scientific and technological achievements made in scientific farming took place here.
					 Attending them were officials, scientists and technicians in the field of agriculture, university teachers, officials and agricultural workers from different farms. 
					
					 The participants exchanged the achievements and experience gained in bean farming and in the work to put farming on a scientific basis in recent years and proposed measures to further develop the agricultural science and technology.
					
					 Displayed at the scientific and technological presentation and exhibition in the field of bean production held at the Grand People's Study House on Feb. 24 and 25 were data on the achievements made in the cultivation of bean of superior strain, distribution of seeds, improvement of technology and method for the bean cultivation and production and use of organic fertilizer and agricultural chemicals. 
					
					 At least 140 papers were presented.
					
					 Those present at the public presentation of scientific and technological achievements made in scientific farming held at the People's Palace of Culture on Feb. 26 and 27 heard at least 150 data introducing the achievements including the experience gained in boosting the grain production by improving the distribution of crops and seeds.

articles.title: Iron Logic Drawn from March First Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Iron Logic Drawn from March First Popular Uprising
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The March First Popular Uprising 90 years ago was a nationwide resistance against brutal "saber rule" of Japanese imperialism. It was a great one which demonstrated fully the independent spirit of the Korean nation at home and abroad and, at the same time, a significant event as President Kim Il Sung participated in the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle for the first time by joining it.
					 With the large-scale anti-Japanese demonstration Pyongyangites held shouting slogans including "Japanese and Japanese troops, get out!" and "Long live the independence of Korea!" on March 1, Juche 8 (1919) as an occasion, the Korean people strong in national independent spirit staged a nation-wide popular uprising in all parts of the country, which was participated in even by Korean residents in Manchuria, Shanghai, the Maritime Province of Siberia, Japan, Hawaii and other countries.
					
					 At that time young President also joined the ranks of demonstrators and went as far as the Pothong Gate, cheering.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists committed crimes of massacring coldbloodedly a great number of peaceful demonstrators with empty hands and naked fists by mobilizing regular army, policemen, fire brigade and even ordinary Japanese in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 It was the day when the President witnessed Korean blood being spilled for the first time. His heart burned with indignation.
					
					 As the sun set and it became dark the villagers climbed Mangyong Hill with torches in their hands. He also went up Mangyong Hill after his mother and there he joined the struggle together with them for several days.
					
					 The cheers for independence which rocked the mountains and rivers of the country echoed like a roll of thunder to the mind of the young President and marked an occasion in promoting his mental growth.
					
					 Later the President looked back upon that "it can be said that my childhood ended as I shouted for independence standing on tiptoe squeezed in between the adults."                                                            
					
					 Through the March First Popular Uprising the Korean people came to realize the truth that if they were to win in the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle, they should have a great leader and wage an organized struggle on the basis of a correct strategy and tactics under the leadership of a revolutionary party. 
					
					 The desire of the Korean people who had thirstily longed for the appearance of a great leader was met when they upheld President Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation.

articles.title: Socialism Shines by Dint of Ideology
articles.content:
Socialism Shines by Dint of Ideology
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il published the famous work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" on March 1, Juche 82 (1993). On the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the work, the army and people of the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the immortal exploits performed by him who has advanced the cause of socialism victoriously with the might of ideology.
					He in the work gave clear-cut answers to the issues of principle arising in defending and accomplishing the cause of socialism including making socialism faith and morale and giving full play to its superiority.
					
					He, with the firm creed that the priority to the ideological work is certain  to achieve the victory of the socialist cause, has led the Korean-style socialism to victory, seizing ideology as the invincible weapon and almighty precious sword.
					
					He, foreseeing the environment of the times and the prospect of the socialist cause with clarity, has developed in depth the Songun idea in the revolutionary practice in a comprehensive way and set it forth as the guideline of the present era.
					
					The great Songun idea gives clear answers to many theoretical and practical problems arising in changed situation of the age and illuminates the way for the triumphant progress of the socialist construction in a scientific way. By this idea, the Songun politics has been established as the main mode of socialist politics and the requirement of Songun embodied thoroughly in all fields of the strengthening of national power, economic and cultural construction and social life, thus providing a precious guideline for dynamically advancing the socialist cause.
					
					The present reality in which socialist Korea is dashing forward toward the high eminence of a great, prosperous and powerful nation with inexhaustible political and military strength provided by dint of Songun proves well the correctness and invincible might of the Songun idea.
					
					Kim Jong Il has strengthened the revolutionary ranks as ones of those unwavering in ideology and faith by standing in the van the People's Army strong in revolutionary spirit, organization and discipline and making it as the core and model.
					
					He has strengthened and developed the army, the main force of revolution, as an army strong in ideology in the flames of the Songun revolution, put forward the revolutionary soldier spirit as the spirit of the times so that the ideological and spiritual world and the traits of work of the army and the people have been made one and the same.
					
					The whole society has been permeated with the spirit of guarding the leader at the risk of lives, the spirit of thorough implementation, the heroic spirit of self-sacrifice and the noble comradely obligation so as to consolidate as firm as rock the single-minded unity of Korea with the leadership of the revolution as the very core.
					
					Kim Jong Il saw to it that the ideological work has been pushed ahead more dynamically whenever the revolution faces manifold hardships, thus bridging over the grave difficulties and bringing about the dawn of a rich and powerful country in this land with the might of ideology.
					
					Today the bugle call of general advance is ringing and the flame of creation and innovation is spreading all over the country thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who is making a new history of construction in the country by setting in motion the all might of ideology.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Plot to Do Harm to DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Plot to Do Harm to DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the group of traitors talked about any nuclear issue, missile issue and the issue of abduction and the like and made such foolish act as committing the "positive support" and "cooperation" with Japan when it met with the foreign minister of Japan who visited south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed commentary observes this.
					
					 This is a provocative act of further aggravating the acute north-south relations and fueling the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak invited the Japanese prime minister to south Korea and was loudmouthed about the "cooperation for the north's nuclear elimination" and "support to the settlement of the abduction issue" and conspired with the Japanese foreign minister the strengthening of the political and military ties against the fellow countrymen. This is because they are pursuing the common ambition of anti-DPRK confrontation and invasion of it.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the Lee Myung Bak group steeped in sycophancy and treachery to realize its wild ambition of invading the north even in collusion with the sworn enemy of the nation.
					
					 The Lee group's hatching anti-DPRK plot with the Japanese foreign minister is nothing but a declaration of negating national independence, the main principle of solving the issue of the nation, opposing the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and standing against the fellow countrymen in group with the foreign force to the last.
					
					 As long as such traitors to the nation, who run amuck with blood-shot eyes to tide over the ruling crisis and realize the ambition of confrontation with fellow countrymen, begging for the help of the outside force, exist, only war will break out, to say nothing of the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 Tumor should be eliminated from its source and poisonous herb be rooted out.

articles.title: All Koreans Urged to Come Out against Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
All Koreans Urged to Come Out against Lee Myung Bak Group
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war after bringing the north-south relations back to those of hostility by pursuing a harsh policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen. In order to foil the moves of the separatists at home and abroad and invigorate the movement for national reunification it is necessary for all the Koreans to strongly reject and stand up against this group. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are programmes for reunification common to the nation as they clearly indicate the fundamental principle for the development of the inter-Korean relations and ways for doing so and how to approach these declarations serves, therefore, as a touchstone distinguishing reunification from division, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group fundamentally negated and ignored the inter-Korean declarations from the outset.
					
					 The improvement of the inter-Korean relations is a prerequisite to achieving national reunification.
					
					 This notwithstanding, no sooner had the group come to office than pushed the inter-Korean relations to the crisis of total severance and stood in the way of achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification by pursuing an unprecedentedly wicked policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said policy is one for a war of aggression against the DPRK and it is, therefore, the root cause of military conflict and war between the north and the south.
					
					 Due to the reckless moves stepped up by the puppet warmongers to escalate the military confrontation pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK the peace on the Korean Peninsula has been seriously harassed and the security of the Koreans gravely threatened.
					
					 The group has committed too serious moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and too many crimes against the nation to evade punishment by history.
					
					 Only when the Lee Myung Bak group, the root cause of all misfortune of the nation, is thrown overboard as early as possible, can the Koreans live in peace and achieve their desire for independent reunification and peace and prosperity.
					
					 The elimination of the Lee group of traitors is desired by all the Koreans and the faster they do, the better, concludes the article.

articles.title: Lee Group's Fascist Suppression of People Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Group's Fascist Suppression of People Flailed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The "Pusan District Court" recently held a trial of five persons including four teachers affiliated to the Pusan Branch of the Teachers' Union of south Korea and imposed penalties upon them on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law" for the mere reason that they produced teaching materials praising the history of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the Juche idea and the Songun politics and supporting socialism and gave lectures on the above-said subjects at "reunification school." 
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Police Agency is mulling setting up a new "police special task force" and building a combined drilling ground for the purpose of conducting exercises for quelling demonstrations by massive use of repressive means including tear gas.
					
					 Branding this as ferocious fascist rowdyism of those staking their fate on dictatorship and repression, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes:
					
					 Those related to the "reunification school" acted justly guided by their conscience to meet the desire and demand of south Koreans from all walks of life. But the south Korean authorities punished them by invoking the draconic NSL, talking about "production of enemy-benefiting teaching materials" and "distribution." This was a preposterous and impudent action, indeed.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's intensified suppression of people is a revelation of its sinister scheme to put down the anti-"government" struggle mounting as the days go by and weather its ruling crisis.
					
					 Dictatorship and suppression, however, can never be a way-out and they will only trigger off a fiercer anti-"government" struggle of the people. 
					
					 Should the Lee group escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and strengthen fascist dictatorship, swimming against the trend of the times, they will certainly meet stern punishment by the people, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Minister of "Unification's" Anti-Reunification Remarks Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Minister of "Unification's" Anti-Reunification Remarks Flailed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down of south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 24 denouncing the remarks made by Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification, for totally denying the inter-Korean declarations.
					 The statement recalled that he at a recent "interpellation at the National Assembly" let loose a spate of nonsense that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are not documents which were ratified by the NA.
					
					 The statement said this was nothing but sophism intended to deny the commitment to implement the said declarations without fail.
					
					 Deploring that such nonsense was talked by the minister of "Unification," the statement urged Hyon to retract his remarks totally denying the declarations on reunification, apologize to the people and step down at once.

articles.title: Joint Struggle against Lee Regime and GNP Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Struggle against Lee Regime and GNP Declared in S.  Korea
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations and opposition parties of south Korea including the People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy and the Democratic Labor Party held a rally in Seoul on Feb. 24 at which they declared that they would stage a joint struggle to check the institution of Lee Myung Bak's evil laws and realize a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about the tragic incident in Ryongsan.
					 In a resolution the participants in the rally denounced the "Grand National Party" for trying to railroad the Lee's evil laws including the law on media at the forthcoming "extraordinary session of the National Assembly."
					
					 We will never remain a passive onlooker to the sinister attempt of the GNP which dominates the NA, they warned. 
					
					 They urged the Lee Myung Bak regime to stop at once its attempt to conceal the truth about the tragic incident in Ryongsan and punish those responsible for the killings.
					
					 All the people will fight against the present regime's suppression, they stated, raising the following demands to the authorities:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime and the GNP, stop at once their attempt to railroad evil bills against democracy, people and the times through the NA.
					
					 Immediately drop the moves to let big businesses control broadcasting services and media and enforce dictatorship.
					
					 The "president," directly apologize for the tragic incident in Ryongsan in which ordinary people were killed due to the brutal exercise of power, and punish those responsible for killings and suppression.
					
					 Immediately make an "investigation into the state administration" and enforce a "special inspection system" at the NA to probe the truth about the Ryongsan incident.
					
					 Stop at once the policy of "redevelopment" encroaching upon the right of the ordinary people.
					
					 Set up inside the NA an all-inclusive mechanism of special measures against the recurrence of the tragic incident in Ryongsan grouping civic and public organizations.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Hostile Policy toward DPRK Rapped
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Hostile Policy toward DPRK Rapped
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The regional headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration denounced the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of puppet traitors to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The North Chungchong Provincial Headquarters of the committee called a press conference in front of the provincial office on Feb. 24 to denounce the misrule of the Lee group in the first year of its office.
					
					 At the press conference the organization charged that the first year of Lee's office sparked the danger of military conflict in the inter-Korean relations in the final analysis.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a practical programme for putting an end to the division of the nation and achieving reunification and peace, it noted.
					
					 It urged the present "government" to abandon its hostile policy toward the DPRK at an early date and sincerely implement the said declarations.
					
					 The Taegu-North Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the above-said committee issued a declaration on the same day in which it declared that the Lee "government" is wholly to blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It demanded the authorities implement the said declarations and stop scattering leaflets against the DPRK, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Unionists Starts General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Unionists Starts General Strike
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Press Trade Union of south Korea began a general strike on Feb. 26, enraged at the action of the "Grand National Party" to railroad the evil bill on media through the puppet National Assembly at any cost.
					 The union declared that more than 80 institutions including the broadcasting services and newspaper offices across south Korea would suspend their work and begin a general strike in protest against the action taken by the GNP to bring up the "bill on media" for discussion at the Committee of Culture, Sports, Tourism, Broadcasting and Communications of the "National Assembly."
					
					 It expressed the determination to simultaneously conduct information activities and candlelight actions in different parts of south Korea to condemn the high-handed practices of the GNP timed to coincide with the above-said strike.
					
					 The MBC union held a ceremony of declaring the strike and launched an all-out boycotting of the program production.
					
					 Unions of SBS, CBS and Yonhap TV News also expressed their will to launch a campaign against the GNP's move to institute an evil law on media.

articles.title: Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The 17th-term action headquarters of the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement titled "Let us all turn out in the struggle to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down" on Feb. 24.
					 The statement deplored that the privileged circle which accounts for just one percent of the society has been busy raking up its profits over the last twelve months since the Lee "government" emerged while the democracy of south Korea has been more savagely violated than in days of the past military dictatorship.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" is a dictatorial regime, the statement said, adding that the "Lee's evil bills" the Grand National Party of south Korea seeks to railroad through the "National Assembly" are nothing but tools for more firmly buttressing the dictatorial power.
					
					 The statement noted that the south-north relations are also inching closer to the brink of a war due to the confrontational moves of the present "government," calling on all the people to turn out in the struggle to force the Lee regime to step down.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bangladesh, Austria, Bulgaria and France on Feb. 12 and 13 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Exhibited in the venues of the meetings were works of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and photos showing their undying feats and the ones introducing the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, noted that the Korean people and other progressive people of the world have dynamically advanced along the road of independence as they have Kim Jong Il, creditable successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that the Korean people would build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country at an early date, true to the Songun policy of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Erich Zavadil, chairman of the Consultative Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, said that the Korean people have dynamically advanced along the road of building a rich and powerful nation and reliably defended socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the France-Korea Friendship Association praised Kim Jong Il as the great statesman recognized by the world for his rare quality and feats, reiterating his will to support the just cause of the Korean people and exert positive efforts to develop the relations between the two countries.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Austria and Bulgaria.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated at DPRK Diplomatic Missions
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated at DPRK Diplomatic Missions
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo exhibitions and film shows and other events took place at the DPRK embassies in China, Vietnam, India, Indonesia, Cambodia, Nepal, Myanmar, Britain, Bulgaria, Uzbekistan, Poland, Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria, Ethiopia, Libya and Brazil and the DPRK consulates general in Shenyang, Hong Kong and Nakhodka in the period from Feb. 6 to 16 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the venues of the events were floral baskets and bunches of flowers presented by political parties, government ministries, organizations and institutions and figures from various circles in the relevant countries.
					
					 Present there on invitation were figures of all social standings, chiefs of the Juche idea study organizations and the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and diplomatic envoys of various countries in the relevant countries.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The permanent vice-chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam noted that the party, government and people of Vietnam are attaching great importance to the traditional relations of friendship and many-sided cooperation with the party, government and people of the DPRK, expressing the will to exert all efforts to boost them.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc noted that the Workers' Party and people of Korea would surely build a thriving socialist nation, smashing all sorts of moves of the imperialists and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that it is the greatest fortune of the Korean people to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il identical to the President.
					
					 The first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea declared that the DPRK has dynamically advanced despite the blockade and pressure by the imperialists thanks to the matchless pluck and principle of Kim Jong Il and the indomitable spirit of its people who regard the sovereignty as their life and soul.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazil-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest and most prominent political and military leader in the present era as he has firmly protected the dignity of the country and socialism, smashing all moves of the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world with the might of the single-minded unity and powerful military power.

articles.title: EPC tomara contramedidas resueltas frente a tropas norteamericanas
articles.content:
EPC tomara contramedidas resueltas frente a tropas norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, frecuentan cada vez mas los actos provocativos y la violacion de las normas por parte de las tropas norteamericanas en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar de Corea, el jefe del grupo de expertos militares de la parte Norte del area de administracion Norte-Sur en las zonas oriental y occidental envio el dia 28 a la parte del ejercito titere surcoreano el siguiente aviso:
					En la actualidad, debido a las brutales maniobras conflictivas con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, persiste la aguda situacion que puede estallar en cualquier momento una guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Bajo tales circunstancias, Estados Unidos maniobra de una manera u otra para agravar la situacion partiendo de su siniestra intencion de realizar a toda costa la ambicion de atropellar a la RPDC. 
					
					  Por ejemplo, las tropas agresoras yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea entran en tropel cuandoquiera y deambulan en el area de administracion Norte-Sur en las zonas oriental y occidental.
					
					  Los dias 5 y 21 de enero, los efectivos norteamericanos, que irrumpieron en el punto a 30 metros desde la Linea de Demarcacion Militar en el area de administracion Norte-Sur en la zona occidental, fotografiaron los puestos de la parte Norte y vigilaron los vehiculos que pasaban por esa linea.
					
					  Hasta el 20 de febrero de este ano, se reportaron 66 casos similares en que 62 uniformados y 58 vehiculos actuaron a sus caprichos en el perimetro a 100 metros desde la Linea de Demarcacion Militar en la zona de administracion N-S.
					
					  Ahora cuando las relaciones Norte-Sur entran en el estado extremado a punto de guerra, tales actos de las tropas norteamericanas, que se cometen en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar bajo la tacita tolerancia de la parte Sur, pueden generar imprevisibles conflictos armados.
					
					  La parte Sur no debe olvidar que el Ejercito Popular de Corea esta en la disposicion de enfrentamiento total.
					
					  Si las tropas norteamericanas siguen actuando con arrogancia en el area de administracion Norte-Sur, el EPC tomara resueltas contramedidas. 
					
					  Los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak deben actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Efectuada X reunion de la copresidencia de la APRP
articles.content:
Efectuada X reunion de la copresidencia de la APRP
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ATCC) -- Se efectuo el dia 28 por facsimile entre el Norte, el Sur de Corea y ultramar la X reunion de la copresidencia de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP).
					  En la reunion se hizo balance del trabajo realizado el ano pasado por la APRP para la reunificacion de la patria y fueron discutidos, entre otros temas, el rumbo de actividades y las tareas de la misma entidad para este ano.
					
					  En la ocasion se presento el informe.
					
					  El informe senalo que en el ano pasado, la APRP desplego energicamente bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" el movimiento por defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y la lucha contra la campana de confrontacion fratricida de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion en el interior y el exterior del pais.
					
					  Definio del 15 de junio al 4 de octubre de este ano como "periodo del movimiento para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre" y resalto la necesidad de que la APRP llame a todos los connacionales al movimiento por la reunificacion.
					
					  La APRP dinamizara la lucha por frustrar las imprudentes maquinaciones de guerra de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y por retirar a las tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea condenando fuertemente los aventureros ejercicios conjuntos militares con las fuerzas extrajeras, apunto.
					
					  Prosiguio que la APRP estara al frente de la lucha por frustrar rotundamente las maquinaciones de represion de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas contra las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion, abolir las infames leyes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion incluyendo la "ley de seguridad" y legalizar las direcciones surenas de la APRP y de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Federacion de Consejos Generales de Estudiantes Universitarios del Sur de Corea y otras entidades.
					
					  En el futuro tambien,  la APRP se esforzara por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad uniendose firmemente con las entidades y las personalidades, que respetan las declaraciones arriba mencionadas y desean su realizacion, por encima de las diferencias de criterios y pertenencias, enfatizo.
					
					  La APRP llamara a amplias masas en el interior y el exterior del pais al movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria mediante la mas solida solidaridad tripartita y promovera energicamente el movimiento pannacional para llevar adelante la epoca del 15 de Junio, concluyo.
					
					  En el acto fue aprobada la resolucion.

articles.title: Verdad dejada por Levantamiento del Primero de Marzo
articles.content:
Verdad dejada por Levantamiento del Primero de Marzoa
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo se desato hace 90 anos en forma de resistencia pannacional contra la barbara "dominacion militar" del imperialismo japones sobre Corea.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung dio inicio a su lucha antiimperialista de liberacion nacional al tomar parte en ese bravo y significativo evento nacional que manifesto dinamicamente en el interior y el exterior del pais el espiritu independiente de la nacion coreana.
					
					 El primero de marzo del 8 (1919) de la Era Juche, el pueblo coreano caracterizado por su fuerte espiritu de independencia nacional comenzo en Pyongyang la multitudinaria manifestacion antijaponesa gritando las consignas "!Fueran los japoneses y el ejercito nipon!", "!Viva la independencia de Corea!", etc. 
					
					 En esta sublevacion, que se extendio a todo el pais, participaron hasta los compatriotas en ultramar como Manchuria, Shanghai, Primorie, Japon y Hawai.
					
					  En aquel dia, el Presidente marcho hasta la Puerta Pothong gritando "hurras" entre las filas de manifestacion integradas por los habitantes de Mangyongdae, su tierra natal.
					
					  Los imperialistas japoneses asesinaron a sangre fria en Pyongyang y otras localidades del pais a numerosos manifestantes pacificos e inermes movilizando al ejercito regular, la policia, el cuerpo de bomberos y hasta a los japoneses civiles.
					
					  Este bano de sangre de los connacionales, de que el Presidente ha sido el testigo presencial por primera vez en su vida, le hizo vibrar de colera.
					
					 Cuando anochecio, los paisanos subieron a la colina Mangyong con antorchas en la mano.
					
					 El Presidente realizo durante varios dias esta forma de lucha junto con su madre y aquellos.
					
					  Los gritos de "!Viva la independencia de Corea!", que aquel dia estremecieron todo el territorio nacional, quedaron grabados en la mente del Presidente acelerando su crecimiento espiritual.
					
					  Mas adelante, el Presidente recordo como sigue: "Podia decir que mi infancia termino en aquel momento en que gritaba !viva la independencia!, puesto de puntillas entre los mayores".
					
					  Mediante el Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo, el pueblo coreano aprendio la verdad de que para lograr la victoria en la lucha antiimperialista de liberacion nacional, debe luchar organizadamente bajo la guia de un gran lider y un partido revolucionario y a base de la correcta estrategia y tacticas.
					
					  El pueblo coreano satisfizo su ansia de contar con un gran lider al enaltecer al Presidente Kim Il Sung como el Sol de la nacion.
